description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a user registration screen, including form validation, input controllers, and navigation for account creation.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a registration form for new users.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form's state, input controllers, and submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Releases the resources held by text controllers.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates the form, checks password confirmation, calls the registration provider, and navigates upon success.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the registration form UI.
